name: 郭美純
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Course Schedule 2016 Semester II
Week 1   26/02   Orientation
Week 2	
Listening (Photos)
Reading (Word choice – noun, verb, adj. adv)
Quiz
Week 3	
Listening (Question-Responses-Statement)

quiz

quiz

Reading (Text Completion)
Quiz

Listening (Question-Responses-When)
Reading (Text Completion)
quiz

Reading (Text completion)
Quiz

Reading (Text completion)
Quiz 
Week 9	April 22 Friday Mid-Term Exam

Week 10

Reading (Text completion)

Quiz

Week 18 	
Final Exam

*** Teaching may be subject to changes if the teacher sees alternatives fit.
scorePolicy:
班上期中考試 35%
班上期末考試 35%
其他 （小考，作業，出席率，上課參與）30%
